column1: About the role:
As a Business Analyst on our Civic Tech team
column2: you will contribute your technical expertise to our government client programs. You will work closely with a team of analysts
column4: and program leads to develop business intelligence recommendations. You will evaluate data to present recommended changes to a user-facing tool stakeholders use to support their mission-critical programs. This position reports to the Program Manager.

column1: In this position you will:
Develop and conduct exploratory analysis of existing business processes for an end-user support office with a federal government client
Deliver and present recommendations to improve or design new business processes based on client stakeholder needs
column2: keeping in mind concepts of human-centered design

column1: Develop and implement reporting on key performance indicators and success metrics using ServiceNow software
Collaborate with developers to design and test user interface changes and reporting requirements
Perform such other reasonable tasks as may be assigned by management.
What we are seeking:
Experience translating business requirements into technical requirements for designers and developers
Experience facilitating requirements gathering sessions with client stakeholders of varying job functions
Developed solutions in collaboration with input from both an internal team and key client stakeholders
Experience navigating a suite of data tables as part of an enterprise
SQL coding experience to report on user or customer interactions
Ability to problem solve
Effective communication and presentation skills with peers
Strong intuition for a desirable user experience as a customer and task fulfiller
Passion for social impact in a data and technology space for federal government clients
In order to be qualified for this position you must currently have or be able to obtain and maintain a Federal Public Trust security clearance
column2: which includes a requirement to have either US Citizenship or three (3) of five (5) years of US residency

column1: You may also have:
Worked with ServiceNow software or similar customer service style platform
R and/or Python programming experience
